comment: The student correctly identifies the equation as the equality case of the Cauchy-Schwarz inequality for integrals. The derivation of the linear dependence condition `g(x)f(x) = c f(x)` is sound. Furthermore, the student provides a comprehensive and rigorous analysis that goes beyond the simplified case presented in the rubric by correctly handling the situation where f(x) can be zero. The characterization of solutions based on the zero set of f is excellent and demonstrates a deep understanding of the problem and its nuances. The solution is flawless.
